DOC.brief_summary: The current study first clinical trial propose PF-06423264 . It design evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) follow administration multiple ascend dos PF-06423264 healthy adult subject without oily skin .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Multiple Ascending Dose Study PF-06423264
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchildbearing potential ; Body Mass Index 17.535.5 kg/m2 ; Body weight > 50 kg ; Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergises , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose )
